summary: Hey, Get your overpowered dragon bone stuff at level one! its the light armor, shield, dagger, bow, and 500 arrows.
descriptionHtml:
So this gives you dragonbone armor, plus dagger, bow, 500 arrows.
to install, simply place in your skyrim folder.
also, open that txt in notepad and change the 02 in the front for the weapons to your dawnguard load order.
Any batch you would want me to make next? Feel free to suggest.
author: OblivionBeaver
